parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~98094~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters within a region, including cluster IDs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language. Valid values:

*   **zh (default)**: simplified Chinese.
*   **en**: English.
*   **ja**: Japanese.
*   **zh-tw**: traditional Chinese.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~454314~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
